Title: Relates to establishing a training program for first responders for responding to victims of suspected drug overdose and the administration of intranasal naloxone
Summary: Establishes a training program for first responders for responding to victims of suspected drug overdose and the administration of intranasal naloxone.
LawCode: Amd ยง3309, add ยง3055, Pub Health L; amd ยง840, add ยง214-g, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the executive law, in relation to establishing a training program for first responders for responding to victims of suspected drug overdose and the administration of intranasal naloxone
